body.name: AOSU Doorbell Camera Wireless, Battery-Powered Video Doorbell with Chime, 2K Resolution, No Monthly Fees, 166° Ultra Wide Angle, 180-Day Battery Life, AI Detection, Work with Alexa & Google Assistant
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 14 hrs 43 mins
Or fastest pickup Tomorrow, February 17. Order within 43 mins
features: See the Whole Picture in 2K Resolution: With 166°wide viewing angle, 4:3 aspect ratio, you could see a person from head to toe or the package on the ground See the Whole Picture in 2K Resolution.
No Subscription Required: aosu video doorbell includes 8G Micro SD card, supports 2 months secure local storage, no monthly fee.
Get Accurate Alerts with Smart Human Detection: Adopted latest AI algorithms to identify humans in the video, reducing false alarms caused by moving objects like animals .
More Stable Signal: aosu video doorbell is equipped with a signal-enhanced base station repeater to maintain a more stable 2.4G Wi-Fi signal connection.
Quick Reply & Voice Changer: When a visitor rings the bell, you can answer/hang up the video call directly or select a preset quick voice reply, also can use voice changer to protect your privacy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Video Door Bell So Far...
reviews.reviewText: This is my Second purchase of the aosu video doorbell. We purchased a second one because of the quality this puts out. We just purchased a second one for another outside area of our house. The video in the recorded event, and the live camera, can't get any clearer, clean and crisp. Night vision is just as clear. The set up, and installation is very easy, and the written instructions, if needed, are simple to follow as well. If there is another person or persons, you want to allow access, you can simply invite that person to your video doorbell. The notifications come directly to you in real time, via your cell phone, computer, or laptop. The doorbell chime is loud enough that I hear it from the second floor. I can't say enough about it. Would I purchase a 3rd one... Yes I would. The price is right. The quality is great, and it does exactly what we purchased it for.I've used the online support a couple times with both doorbells. They responded quickly, and answered my question. Gave me direction with that question, and it did what I needed it to do. Communication and response time, makes all the difference.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 22, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good value for the price
reviews.reviewText: Pros: well packaged, easy-to-follow directions, easy to install (two screws to install the mounting bracket, device just snaps into place), easy to connect to Wi-Fi, easy to share with others, local storage (cloud subscription available but optional), good night vision, good field-of-view, good image quality, good customer support, app works well on phones and tablets, many customizable options in the app, comes with 8GB micro SD card and USB-C charging cable (although it's a bit short), live view, easily review recent events (car or person passing by, etc.).Cons: no PC/laptop app yet but customer support says they are working on it.This is my first doorbell camera so I can't compare it to other doorbell cams, but I have other motion-sensing security cameras and this is the best one. If you are looking for a good doorbell camera, or just a good security cam, seriously consider this one. Since I already had a perfectly adequate doorbell, I bought this just for the camera function, because it is small and could be installed in a strategic location. If you get the battery version and it is used for other than just a doorbell, it should be installed in an easy-to-reach location because you will have to periodically recharge the battery. Note to seller: a separate monitor and solar charging would be helpful.EDIT: if you turn on the Doorbell Anti-Theft Warning after installing, and you should, make sure you TURN IT OFF before detaching the device from the mounting bracket. It is quite loud!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great doorbell and customer service
reviews.reviewText: Like this doorbell: easy to install and setup, image is unbeatable, motion detection and notification are all good, it picks up sound so well, I can hear bird chirping from distance. Videos are stored locally, so no cloud fee, no subscription needed . Bought it over 6 months, only charged battery once. Had an issue with homebase, contacted customer service through email, they were very helpful, checked the problem, replaced it right away. With this great doorbell and great customer service to backup with, I really don't have anything to complain.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have looked at a lot of these doorbells. I wanted inexpensive, Alexa compatibility, and wireless. This one met all 3 and was on sale when I purchased. Installation was easy, the app works well, and I can bring it up on my Echo Show. The only problem I have is the response time. I have gotten deliveries and the driver is on the way back to the truck by the time I get alert on phone. There's even occasional missed notifications. No beep but delivered package to door. I have a deck at back door and it's a good 10 steps to the door so I should have plenty of time to get notified. I think the problem is distance. If I let dog out it goes off right away. But there's a delay when further away from it. Still overall I think it's a good buy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So far the doorbell is great.
reviews.reviewText: The video doorbell was very easy to install and I usually can’t install anything. Easy to set up. Video quality is great. Settings easily customized to your preferences.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The best in the market….seriously!
reviews.reviewText: This video doorbell camera is a game-changer! The 2K resolution and wide viewing angle offer a crystal-clear picture, capturing everything from head to toe. I was sold on the technical specs but loved that it required no subscription of any kind (the ones they offer do have great value but I did increase the storage so I have no need but it includes an 8GB Micro SD card which gives you two months of local storage with certain ssettings). It has amazing an Smart Human Detection feature so it reduces false alarms, and the signal-enhanced base station ensures a stable Wi-Fi connection especially with those who have WiFi 6 capabilities. There’s a Quick Reply feature and voice changer which my son loves to play with but I do wish there was a way to disable it (I accidentally touch it a lot and it scares me every time! Lol). I purchased this in September 2022 and had an issue where it stopped working about 6 months ago and they quickly replaced it!!! All in all, it’s a tech-savvy choice for home security and they have outstanding customer service. I now own 3 devices and already looking to add more for indoor security (moms with babies/toddlers understand!).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Two words: Get it!
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this door video/bell in July 2023. After set-up, it works perfectly. When away from home, there is, of course, a slight delay in getting a signal if someone rings the doorbell but if you're quick to your phone, the problem is slight. I use the "local memory" function rather than the cloud and, importantly, unlike some other units of this type, the SD card is housed in the indoor chime, not the doorbell unit itself.And here's the best part. For some reason the indoor unit lost and would not regain the Wi-Fi link. After trying to find out what was going on, I found that the "sync" button on the chime would not work. Dang. An email to the Aosu produced a prompt reply and a completely new unit - doorbell and chime. Now that's service!Good product. Good support. What more can you ask for!

reviews.reviewTitle: High quality picture/video, motion sensing good, you might get many alerts a day
reviews.reviewText: Very easy to setup and install. Make sure you try positioning the camera and see what it sees before you finalize installation. Seems well built, operating since yesterday without issues. Just a few doorbell sounds available but it's better than the original ringbell we had. Motion detection convenient if you are away or if you have your nose in your phone all day. Camera is good, we see well during the day and it is also satisfactory at night (black & white.) At recommended 48in (1.2m), you may have a hard time picking up the full face of a tall person (above 6ft), either tilt it a few degrees up or install higher.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I’ve had a video doorbell for around 5 years, we originally had a ring doorbell until the battery no longer held charge so I decided to move away from Ring and to this AOSU video doorbell. In my opinion it is so much better than a ring doorbell, the local storage plus a chime really make it worth the money. No more monthly/yearly subscriptions to keep my video events. The camera quality and motion detection is also truly excellent, crisp and clear audio and sound make this an excellent device! Installation was easy and the price is very competitive compared to amazons ring devices, nest doorbells or amazons blink devices, if your in the market for a video doorbell this is the one to get!

reviews.reviewTitle: Sonnette High-tech et pratique, avec quelques petites astuces.
reviews.reviewText: Je suis vraiment ravi. L'installation est un jeu d'enfant, ça se connecte facilement au Wi-Fi de la maison. La qualité d'image est top, même de nuit, et on peut zoomer sans perdre en netteté.Ce que j'adore, c'est la détection de mouvement. Ça enregistre des vidéos sur une carte SD fournie, ce qui est super pratique. Par contre, si vous habitez une rue passante, préparez-vous à recevoir pas mal d'alertes. (On peut désactiver l'option mais l'enregistrement de nuit est un Must en désactivant les notifications). Vous pouvez ajuster la sensibilité, mais ça reste un point à considérer. Il y a aussi une option d'abonnement cloud, mais c'est payant.Petite astuce : gardez bien l'outil spécial pour retirer la sonnette du mur. Si vous la remettez mal après la recharge (tous les 3 mois environ), une alarme se déclenche.Côté smartphone, c'est génial. Je vois qui sonne et je peux même répondre directement. Juste un bémol, si vous êtes dans un endroit bruyant, c'est difficile de se faire entendre.La sonnette a des options de voix modifiées et des messages préenregistrés, mais on ne peut pas créer les siens. Malgré ces petits détails, je recommande vraiment cette sonnette. Je pense même à l'intégrer à un système de surveillance plus complet.

reviews.reviewTitle: Preis | Leistung super und für meine Zwecke vollkommen zufrieden
reviews.reviewText: Ich habe kürzlich die Aosu Türklingel erworben. Die Lieferung erfolgte prompt und in einem einwandfreien Zustand.Zum Inhalt: geliefert wird die Türklingel, Montagematerial, Halterung, Sticker, Kabel zum Laden sowie ausführliche Beschreibungen und Material zur Garantie etc.Die Türklingel macht auf dem ersten Blick einen haltbaren und wertigen Eindruck. Überrascht war icu doch von dem hohen Gewicht, welches vermutlich durch den integrierten Akku zustande kommt. Ansonsten ist die komplette Ausführung in Kunststoff, was mich persönlich aber nicht stört. Vielleicht denkt Aosu noch drüber nach in Zukunft andere Farben für das Gehäuse herzustellen.Die Montage war an sich sehr einfach. Es wird eine Halterung mit zwei Dübeln und Schrauben an der Hauswand angebracht. Hier wäre eventuell eine Schablone hilfreich, es ging aber auch so. Anschließen klickt man die Kamera in den Rahmen und schaltet sie ein.Die Verknüpfung mit der App ist sehr einfach, man scannt den Code auf der Kamera und noch einmal den Code vom Bildschirm auf dem Smartphone mit der Türklingel und schon ist die Kamera verbunden.Zusätzlich muss man nun noch einen Platz in der Wohnung finden wo man den Stecker für die Klingel (damit man das klingeln auch hört) gefunden werden.In der App selbst gibt es zahlreiche Einstellmöglichkeiten auf die ich zunächst nicht weiter eingehe. Die Bedienung und Einstellung ist aber sehr einfach und übersichtlich gestaltet und bietet alle möglichen Funktionen.Zum Alltag: die Türklingel funktioniert einwandfrei und sehr zuverlässig! Bisher haben wir jedes Klingeln auch vernommen und man bekommt gleich eine Benachrichtigung aufs Handy. Öffnet man diese hat man die Möglichkeit sich auf die Türklingel zu schalten um zu sehen wer da ist. Das Blickfeld ist sehr groß und man kann auch in weiter Entfernung noch jemanden erkennen. Auch bei Nacht können Personen direkt vor der Kamera gut erkannt werden.Zusätzlich hat man auch die Möglichkeit über die App zu kommunizieren um z.B. dem Paketboten mitzuteilen dass er die Sendung liegen lassen soll. Da bei uns der Router sehr weit weg ist mussten wir einen repeater nahe der Klingel setzen damit eine flüssige Übertragung von Video Ton und Sprache möglich ist. Ich denke mal dass bis 10m aber kein Problem sein sollten.Für den Preis und vor allem der Vorteil dass es dabei bleibt und kein Abo nötig ist, finde ich die Kamera auf jeden Fall super. Sie tut ihren Job, ist im Vergleich zu bekannteren Marken relativ günstig und verpflichtet halt nicht zu weiteren Kosten. Einzig die Option Gesichter zu speichern ist Aufpreispflichtig, was aber ja nicht zwingend für die Nutzung erforderlich ist sondern einfach nur eine interessante Zusatzfunktion ist. Die Funktion habe ich bisher aber nicht getestet und kann der nichts über die Zuverlässigkeit sagen.Gerne werde ich an dieser Stelle noch weitere Infos im Laufe der Zeit ergänzen. Wichtige Sachen wie Akkulaufzeit und Langlebigkeit des Akkus und Kamera sowie einfach mehr alltägliche Praxis konnte ich noch nicht sammeln da wir die Kamera erst eine Woche haben.

Ho ricevuto il prodotto, si installa e configura in modo davvero semplice… il funzionamento è davvero ottimo, veloce e reattivo. Ottimo audio e molto bello da vedere. Impeccabile anche l’assistenza clienti, sono gentilissimi e sempre pronti a dare supporto. Consigliatissimo!
